subject: Pro Pedals not X and haptics
description_text:
I have the original pro pedals attached pic.
is there a control box that will allow me to use the Simsonn haptics my wife got me for my birthday? I have the plus x control box and it recognizes the pedals with the old controller but just says disconected when I plug throttle and brake into plus x control box.
[image0.png]
Eric Armstrong
Information Technology Director
Sauk-Suiattle Indian Tribe

conversations.body_text: Hi Eric Armstrong, The PlusX control box supports the haptic module, but it requires a separate 24V power supply. Are you currently using the USB 3.0 port (blue) on the back of your PC? Please avoid using USB hubs without independent power. Could you take a photo showing your pedal connections and the SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0 software screen? I can help you check whether the installation and software version are working correctly.

I think I figured it out the control box was mounted to a plastic part of my rig. ( not grounded ) once I bolted it to metal ( grounded ) it seems to be working.

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
